text:
uality evidence
Review question 
In all or a sub-population of newborns (P), does routine application of chlorhexidine to the 
umbilical cord stump (I) compared with dry cord care or usual cord practices (C) reduce 
the neonatal mortality rates and/or the incidence of systemic sepsis and omphalitis in the 
neonatal period (O)? 
Summary of evidence
A systematic review was conducted to evaluate the effect of topical application of 
chlorhexidine to the umbilical cord as the Cochrane review on topi
